text: On 24 November 2015, a bus carrying Tunisian presidential guards exploded, killing 12, on a principal road in Tunis. After the attack, President Beji Caid Essebsi issued a state of emergency in Tunisia. ISIL claimed responsibility for the attack. The bomber, who killed himself in the attack, was identified as Houssem Abdelli. ==References== Category:2010s explosions in Africa Category:2010s in Tunisia Category:Attacks on buses Category:Explosions in 2015 Category:Islamic State Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Africa Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in 2015 Category:Mass murder in 2015 Category:Mass murder in Africa Category:November 2015 events Category:Suicide bombings in Africa Category:Suicide bombings in the 2010s Category:Terrorist incidents in Africa in the 2010s 2015 bombing
title: 2015 Tunis bombing
